channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report X-2024040787
item.description:
Report X-2024040787

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-22T15:11:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-12
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS PICKED UP ON UNLOAD CRUSHED COMPLETELY AND THE CONTENTS SPILLING OUT DescribePack: UPON INSPECTION FOUND 4 OUT OF 4 BOTTLES TO BE CRUSHED ALLOWING THE CONTENTS TO SPILL OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: RED TOTE

item.title: Report X-2024040848
item.description:
Report X-2024040848

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-22T15:11:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-10
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING ON THE UNLOAD TRAILER FROM THE PREVIOUS FACILITY. DescribePack: THE CAP CAME LOOSE ON THE PLASTIC JUG CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT INTERNALLY AND COAT THE OTHER JUGS IN THE PACKAGE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024040696
item.description:
Report X-2024040696

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-16T18:13:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-10
  • City: SPARROWS POINT
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: discovered damaged on 1000 van line.outer container was wet.upon inspection no internal partition or inner packing material.one bottle had a loose cap leaking out 1 gal of content. DescribePack: failure was due to no internal partition or packing material resulting in internal leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: chemical neutralizer was used to contain spill.package was placed in tote and put under ventilation system.

item.title: Report X-2024040676

Report X-2024040676

  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: I found wet package in the damage hazmat cage. I repacked contents of the package and completed the required reports for a damage hazmat package. DescribePack: There is a hole in the box caused by internal leakage from a loose cap on a container. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a tub and taken to the damage hazmat cage.
